name: Rebel without a Claus
description:
You are a rebellious elf tasked with following the Naughty List and sabotaging Christmas. Steal Presents, stop the gift production and even sabotage Santa's Sleigh.

I developed this project in Unity for a University assignment. I modelled and textured the majority of the low-poly assets. I implemented a robust architecture in Unity, adopting an event system to remove dependencies. I also developed my own player controller using the new Unity Input System,  with material-specific footstep sounds. I also produced a simple conveyor belt system to move the present assets. 

The concept of a rebellious elf sabotaging Christmas is interesting to me, and I would enjoy developing the concept further into a game about an elf infiltrating Santa's workshop and undermining him - only to realize your own protagonist is deluded and unjustifiably sabotaging Christmas.
